00021 #ifndef _FusionCoords_HEADER_
00022 #define _FusionCoords_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file FusionCoords.h This file defines the fusion coordinate classes.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #include <cstring>
00028 #include <list>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 //
00032 
00033 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00034 {
00035 
00036         /*! Defines a floating-point location */
00037         struct FPoint
00038         {
00039                 /*! The x coordinate */
00040                 float x;
00041 
00042                 /*! The y coordinate */
00043                 float y;
00044 
00045                 /*! Equality test */
00046                 bool operator==(const FPoint& lhs)const { return (x==lhs.x && y==lhs.y); }
00047                 /*! Inequality test */
00048                 bool operator!=(const FPoint& lhs)const { return !(*this==lhs); }
00049         };
00050 
00051         typedef std::vector<FPoint> FPointVector;
00052 
00053         /*! Defines a floating point rectangle */
00054         struct FGridCoords
00055         {
00056                 /* Empty constructor */
00057                 FGridCoords() { upperleft.x = 0.0f, upperleft.y = 0.0f; upperright = lowerright = lowerleft = upperleft; }
00058 
00059                 /*! Tests if the rectangle is empty */
00060                 bool IsEmpty() const
00061                 {
00062                         if (upperleft == upperright && lowerleft == lowerright && upperleft == lowerleft)
00063                                 return true;
00064                         return false;
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 /*! The upper left coordinate */
00068                 FPoint upperleft;
00069 
00070                 /*! The upper right coordinate */
00071                 FPoint upperright;
00072 
00073                 /*! The lower right coordinate */
00074                 FPoint lowerright;
00075 
00076                 /*! The lower left coordinate */
00077                 FPoint lowerleft;
00078         };
00079 
00080 }
00081 
00082 #endif  // _FusionCoords_HEADER_
